title: Wrath of Mother Earth
description:
With Earth Day coming up we tend to take a better look at the planet around us. Typically we see the lush trees, dancing rivers, and the earth on which we ground ourselves. But the climate is changing and Mother Nature isn't happy. Hidden in her darkest corners luck powerful crystals, trees that breathe, and monsters that would do anything protect the sacred secrets of the earth. Especially if that means killing humans. 

First, nature’s always listening 
Followed by a deadly family secret
Then, a trapped soul’s revenge
Finally in our featured story, the shrill cry of death

Match with your dedicated therapist today at talkspace.com, and use promo code scary during sign-up to get $100 off your first month.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
